alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:14PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Grand Forks and north central Traill Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 314 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Reynolds, or 17 miles south of Grand Forks, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reynolds, Holmes and Thompson. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 122 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
